oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-02-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 27, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Archie Campbell, the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl (back from her previous week in California with Tennessee Ernie Ford), and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1064th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Copas; Randy Hughes; Archie Campbell; Louvin Brothers; Jordanaires; Tommy Jackson; Ralph Sloan; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Cowboy Copas -- A World That's Real (Cowboy Copas, Randy Hughes) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas and Grant Turner introduce the Louvin Brothers -- The Stagger (Louvin Brothers, Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Tommy Jackson -- Dusty Miller (Tommy Jackson fiddle, Ralph Sloan calls) -- Grant Turner and Cowboy Copas talk -- Don't Shake Hands With The Devil (Cowboy Copas, Jordanaires) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Chet Atkins -- White Silver Sands (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States.
